desc: Precious silver ore of high purity and incredible resilience mined from a secret cave.
lore:
Precious silver ore of high purity and incredible resilience mined from a secret cave. Though it has applications in alchemy, its best-recorded use is in the forging of a legendary hero's sword.
Whether the sword made him a hero, or the hero had mythologized the sword, is a matter of debate.
name: Silver Ore
